summary: Configuration container that defines all architectural hyper‑parameters for the various REALM components (embedder, scorer, knowledge‑augmentation encoder, retriever, reader and OpenQA model). It stores sizes, layer counts, dropout rates, projection dimensions and other settings needed to build a REALM model instance.
business_intent: Enable developers to easily customize and instantiate REALM‑based retrieval‑augmented language models for tasks such as open‑domain question answering, knowledge‑enhanced encoding, and document retrieval by providing a single, editable configuration object.
